duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement automation solutions with PLC, HMI, SCADA, and DCS/Delta V platforms.
Lead a team of engineers in identifying requirements, developing specifications, and implementing/testing/commissioning/qualifying automation solutions.
Deliver innovative automation solutions and design standards either self-directed or as a leader of a team.
Conceptualize, detail, and implement control systems for industrial processes and machinery.
Select components, detail schematic diagrams, and develop control system architecture.
Program controllers (PLC, DCS/Delta V) and process visualization (HMI/SCADA), and develop databases for archiving/displaying historical system data.
Design and implement fiber, wired, and wireless systems using industrial protocols.
Develop project execution plans, work breakdown structures, budgets, task prioritization, scheduling, time tracking, reporting, and early problem identification.
Oversee daily operations and activities of a project(s) up to $1M, ensuring the overall profitability of the project.
Act as technical lead on projects, guide lower-level engineers and technicians, and act as Project Manager on smaller projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science degree in Electrical/Control Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Chemical Engineering, or Computer Science, or equivalent experience.
